name: really looooooooong loooong name
content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><scxml     datamodel="ecmascript"    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/07/scxml"    version="1.0">    <state id="a">        <transition target="b" event="t"/>        <transition target="c" event="t"/>    </state>        <state id="b"/>    <state id="c"/></scxml>
